Flow.description: V13 is saved by brandon i Added the get start date from affiliation at the top, added a third decision tree and moved update affiliation to only execute within the term all DC and DB.

formulas.name: LastDayofMonth
formulas.expression: IF( MONTH( {!soCase.Last_Day_Worked__c} ) = 12, DATE( YEAR( {!soCase.Last_Day_Worked__c} ), 12, 31 ), DATE( YEAR( {!soCase.Last_Day_Worked__c}), MONTH({!soCase.Last_Day_Worked__c}) + 1, 1) - 1)

Flow.label: Termination Send Options

fields.name: confirmNotTerm
fields.fieldText:
Please confirm the following details about this case:

Member: {!varName}

Member PIN: {!soCase.PIN__c}

Member Type: {!soCase.Member_Type__c}

Organization Name: {!OrgName}

Employer PIN: {!soCase.Org_PIN__c}

Last Day of Work: {!soCase.Last_Day_Worked__c}

Termination Action: {!soCase.Reason}


By clicking Next below, you will send these updates to LifeWorks, end billing rows, change the member's salary to 0, and send the termination action with the termination date. This case will be closed.


Click Next to execute the above actions. Otherwise, click Previous.

fields.name: confirmTerm
fields.fieldText:
Please confirm the following details about this case:

Member: {!varName}

Member PIN: {!soCase.PIN__c}

Member Type: {!soCase.Member_Type__c}

Options Form: {!varDocument}

Organization Name: {!OrgName}

Employer PIN: {!soCase.Org_PIN__c}

Last Day of Work: {!soCase.Last_Day_Worked__c}

Termination Action: {!soCase.Reason}


By clicking Next below, you will send these updates to LifeWorks, end billing rows, change the member's salary to 0, and send the termination action with the termination date. The member will be sent the {!varDocument}, and the case will be placed on hold as we await their response.


Click Next to execute the above actions. Otherwise, click Previous.
